page.title: 08Population west: Fintry
page.content: Uninhabited Ballindalloch Muir and land north of the Endrick are in Balfron Parish. The land to the south is in Killearn.{People living in the {eastern third consider they are part {of Fintry community. Groups of dwellings occur at Balgair and Ballikinrain and others scatter along the two roads which traverse the area. Of the 32 dwellings, half are farm houses or cottages, and 7 are modern homes. There are 18 families, half with children under 16. Of the 7 couples, 5 have both members working. Out of the population of 96 only 9 are retired. In the total employment market of 44 nearly half are in farming, with three family groups of several generations. The remaining occupations are more varied and include 5 teachers.
